headline: Supreme Court Blocks Texas Law On Social Media Censorship
short_description: The court voted in an unusual 5-4 alignment Tuesday to put the Texas law on hold, while a lawsuit plays out in lower courts.

headline: Uvalde's Next Steps: Visitations, Funerals And Burials, One After Another
short_description: Over the next two-and-a-half traumatic weeks, the Uvalde community will say goodbye to the 19 children and two teachers killed in a mass shooting.

headline: Kody Clemens, Roger Clemens' Son, Set To Make Major League Debut With Detroit Tigers
short_description: "I don't have to live up to what he did," Kody Clemens said of his pitching great pop after being called up from the minors.

headline: 1 Dead After Crashing Into Miami Pond Teeming With Alligators
short_description: Police snipers guarded the pond during a tense rescue attempt.

headline: Sonic Workers Find An Absolute Nightmare Lurking Just Behind The Fry Machine
short_description: They fled the restaurant and called the cops.

headline: The Biggest COVID Issues People Bring Up In Therapy
short_description: Mental health experts reveal the common pandemic-related struggles people discuss in sessions, plus advice on how to cope.

headline: Angel Statue Beheaded At Church, $2 Million Relic Stolen
short_description: The New York City church says its stolen 18-carat gold relic was guarded by its own security system and is irreplaceable due to its historical and artistic value.

headline: Here’s How Day Drinking Affects Your Body Differently, According To Experts
short_description: Drinking a pitcher of margaritas poolside hits different from an evening glass of wine. Three doctors explain exactly how.

headline: Georgia DA Could Bury Trump With His Own Words, Says Former Fed Prosecutor
short_description: Trump, meanwhile, is blasting the special grand jury probe into his demand for extra Georgia votes after he lost the election.

headline: Weapons That Can Cause 'Grave Damage' Aren't Sacred, Texas Bishop Fumes
short_description: "Don't tell me that guns aren't the problem, people are. I'm sick of hearing it," tweeted Brownsville Bishop Daniel Flores.

headline: Adam Kinzinger Calls Gun Age Limits 'A No-Brainer,' Considers Assault Weapon Ban
short_description: “Can we stop all of it? No. Can we mitigate it? Certainly. And we should be doing that now," the Illinois Republican said of gun violence following last week's mass shooting.

headline: Texas Gov. Greg Abbott Loudly Booed At Uvalde Memorial
short_description: "Shame on you, Abbott!" a crowd member yelled as Abbott arrived with the Bidens at the school where 19 children and two teachers were killed.

headline: Christian Nationalism On The Rise In Some GOP Campaigns
short_description: Doug Mastriano’s win in the Pennsylvania gubernatorial primary marks a high-profile victory for the movement.
authors: PETER SMITH and DEEPA BHARATH, AP NEWS

headline: Netflix Co-CEO Backs Dave Chappelle, Says Programs Are 'Not Going To Be For Everybody'
short_description: The streaming giant has faced backlash due to comedians' transphobic comments in recent specials.

headline: Federal Judges Overrule Ohio Supreme Court: Mandate Voided Voting Map
short_description: The decision is a win for the Republican-dominated redistricting commission, which passed five straight sets of legislative maps that couldn’t meet constitutional muster.

headline: Oregon Man Parts Ways With Guns In Viral Change Of Heart
short_description: The man said he hopes the U.S. "wakes up" and addresses gun violence in a plea on TikTok.
